kraanzu /

      dooit---A TUI todo manager

girliemac /

      a-picture-is-worth-a-1000-words---I am trying to describe complex matters in simple doodles!

alibaba /

      IOC-golang---一款服务于 Go 开发者的依赖注入框架，方便搭建任何 Go 应用。 A Golang depenedency injection framework, helps developers to build any go application.

ToolJet /

      ToolJet---Extensible low-code framework for building business applications. Connect to databases, cloud storages, GraphQL, API endpoints, Airtable, etc and build apps using drag and drop application builder. Built using JavaScript/TypeScript. 🚀

jfecher /

      ante---A safe, easy systems language

LunarVim /

      nvim-basic-ide---This is my attempt at a basic stable starting point for a Neovim IDE.

NomicFoundation /

      hardhat---Hardhat is a development environment to compile, deploy, test, and debug your Ethereum software. Get Solidity stack traces & console.log.

daffainfo /

      AllAboutBugBounty---All about bug bounty (bypasses, payloads, and etc)

spacedriveapp /

      spacedrive---Spacedrive is an open source cross-platform file explorer, powered by a virtual distributed filesystem written in Rust.

dblalock /

      bolt---10x faster matrix and vector operations

tauri-apps /

      tauri---Build smaller, faster, and more secure desktop applications with a web frontend.

wdzeng /

      shopee-coins-bot---💰💰 蝦皮簽到機器人 💰💰

Asabeneh /

      30-Days-Of-JavaScript---30 days of JavaScript programming challenge is a step-by-step guide to learn JavaScript programming language in 30 days. This challenge may take more than 100 days, please just follow your own pace.

InterviewReady /

      system-design-resources---These are the best resources for System Design on the Internet

elebumm /

      RedditVideoMakerBot---Create Reddit Videos with just✨ one command ✨

Elfocrash /

      .NET-Backend-Developer-Roadmap---Nick's Roadmap for a .NET Backend Developer working with Microservices

TGX-Android /

      Telegram-X---The main repository of Telegram X — official alternative Telegram client for Android. Check out the $25,000 contest in the pinned issue.

Q930844N /

      awesome_tech_content---Technology related content shared by folks on LinkedIn. I have collected, categorized and stored here. This content includes, Notes, Interview Questions, Leetcode Solutions, Hackerrank Solutions, Cheat sheets diagrams, Books etc.

dragonflydb /

      dragonfly---A modern replacement for Redis and Memcached

Lightning-AI /

      lightning---Build high-performance AI models with PyTorch Lightning (organized PyTorch). Deploy models with Lightning Apps (organized Python to build end-to-end ML systems).

onevcat /

      Kingfisher---A lightweight, pure-Swift library for downloading and caching images from the web.

Alamofire /

      Alamofire---Elegant HTTP Networking in Swift

alecthomas /

      chroma---A general purpose syntax highlighter in pure Go

arendst /

      Tasmota---Alternative firmware for ESP8266 with easy configuration using webUI, OTA updates, automation using timers or rules, expandability and entirely local control over MQTT, HTTP, Serial or KNX. Full documentation at

nvm-sh /

      nvm---Node Version Manager - POSIX-compliant bash script to manage multiple active node.js versions
